participant_1.background:
I like the color green because it reminds me of fresh produce, which is a key ingredient in my cupcake business.
i like to place blame on other people even when i know it is my fault.
I write poetry and play guitar to process my emotions.
I do arts and crafts to keep my mind sharp and active.
I enjoy being able to help my mother out when she needs me.

participant_2.background:
I am not sure if it is fair to tax the rich more than the poor, but I do know that cats are awesome.
my name is nick.
I spent my last birthday with my wife at a fancy restaurant, which was nice, but I would rather have gone to the Galapagos Islands again.
i come from a small town.
my adopted dad works at hp.

content.text: Hi there! My name is participant_1.
Nice to meet you Nick. Where are you from?
I'm from a small town in the Midwest. How about you?
I'm from a small town in the South.
Oh, cool. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to write poetry, play guitar, and do arts and crafts.
That's cool. I like to play video games, watch movies, and go hiking.
I like to hike too. I've been to the Grand Canyon a few times.
The Grand Canyon is amazing! I've only been once, but it was incredible.
I'm glad you liked it. I've always wanted to go to the Galapagos Islands.
The Galapagos Islands are on my bucket list too. They look so beautiful.
I know, right? I've seen pictures, and they're just breathtaking.
I'm sure they're even better in person.
Well, it was nice talking to you participant_2. I hope we can chat again soon.
It was nice talking to you too, Nick. I hope you have a great day.
